title: In old Kentucky
brief_description: The American Civil War may divide a family when brothers Robert and George enlist on opposite sides but when one brother finds himself on the run after being captured as a spy, family loyalty comes to the rescue. Cast includes Henry B. Walthall, Owen Moore, Verner Clarges, Kate Bruce, Mary Pickford, Mack Sennett.
